section.name: Current status
section.p:
June 1, 2007 - Struts Menu 2.4.3 Released.
This is a bug fix release. See the changelog for a complete list of changes.

subsection.name: Version 2.4.3 Released - June 1, 2007
subsection.p: Bug fix release. See the changelog for a complete list of changes.

subsection.name: Version 2.4.2 Released - October 18, 2006
subsection.p: Bug fixes, particular for Velocity+Security and CSS Menus. See the changelog for a complete list of changes.

subsection.name: Version 2.4.1 Released - July 09, 2006
subsection.p: Bug fixes, especially for Velocity and CSS-based menus. See the changelog for a complete list of changes.

subsection.name: Version 2.4 Released - May 10, 2006
subsection.p: Fixed a number of bugs and made menus more CSS-friendly. Improved performance drastically, particularly for the VelocityMenuDisplayer. See the changelog for a complete list of changes.

subsection.name: Version 2.3 Released - September 27, 2004
subsection.p: Fixed many bugs reported in the various trackers and completely de-coupled tag from Struts. If you're not using Struts, struts.jar is no longer required in the classpath. See the changelog for a complete list of changes.

subsection.name: Version 2.2 Released - March 30, 2004
subsection.p: Removed JSTL from core tag for JSP 1.1 compatibility. Removed Struts dependency and added examples for configuration in Spring. Enhanced EL tag and added dynamic menu (from database) example. See the changelog for a complete list of changes.

subsection.name: Version 2.1 Released - December 20, 2003
subsection.p: JSTL Support, Highlighting menu selected in Expandable List, fixed bugs in Forward/Action lookup. See the changelog, for all the bug fixes in 2.1.

subsection.name: Version 2.0 Released - November 30, 2003
subsection.p: Release of Struts Menu 2.0 - Refactored to use Velocity for defining HTML used in menus. If it's possible to create a menu with HTML/CSS/JavaScript, it should be possible to create with Struts Menu. As you can see in the changelog, a lot of enhancements have been made in this release.
